methods.name: public static IBinder getService(String name)
methods.comment: * Returns a reference to a service with the given name. * * @param name the name of the service to get * @return a reference to the service, or null if the service doesn't exist

methods.name: public static IBinder getServiceOrThrow(String name) throws ServiceNotFoundException
methods.comment: * Is not supposed to return null, but that is fine for layoutlib.

methods.name: public static void addService(String name, IBinder service)
methods.comment:
* Place a new @a service called @a name into the service
     * manager.
     *
     * @param name the name of the new service
     * @param service the service object

methods.name: public static IBinder checkService(String name)
methods.comment:
* Retrieve an existing service called @a name from the
     * service manager.  Non-blocking.

methods.name: public static String[] listServices()
methods.comment: * Return a list of all currently running services. * @return an array of all currently running services, or null in * case of an exception

methods.name: public static void initServiceCache(Map<String, IBinder> cache)
methods.comment:
* This is only intended to be called when the process is first being brought
     * up and bound by the activity manager. There is only one thread in the process
     * at that time, so no locking is done.
     *
     * @param cache the cache of service references
     * @hide

methodNames: public static IBinder getServiceOrThrow(String name) throws ServiceNotFoundException
public static void addService(String name, IBinder service)
public static void initServiceCache(Map<String, IBinder> cache)
